metadata.name: Quick Kill Fix
metadata.description:
Quick kill (debug 10) is useful when testing mods. Unfortunately, this option causes issues with a few bosses. This mod fixes those issues.
[list] [*]The Lamb: The Lamb's body won't keep spamming the poof animation [*]Delirium: Delirium will actually die rather than getting stuck in a loop [*]Rotgut: Rotgut's first phase won't get stuck anymore, and you can proceed to the next phase [*]Mother: Mother won't die immediately, Mother2 will spawn, and you won't be softlocked [*]Dogma: Dogma won't die immediately, you won't be softlocked, and you'll be taken to The Beast [/list]
